QueryDefinition.Query: select 224 id, patid, (select [start] from {sc}.hes_linkage_coverage where data_source='hes') as hes_start, (select [end] from {sc}.hes_linkage_coverage where data_source='hes') as hes_end from {sc}.HES_linkage_eligibility JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patid = ch.PERSON_ID where hes_e=1 order by patid
